scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build:lambda
scripts.build: URL=$(if [ -n "$URL" ]; then echo "-b $URL"; fi); hugo version; hugo --gc --minify $URL
scripts.preview: npm run prebuild; DEPLOY_PRIME_URL=$(if [ -n "$DEPLOY_PRIME_URL" ]; then echo "-b $DEPLOY_PRIME_URL"; fi); hugo version; hugo --gc --minify --buildFuture $DEPLOY_PRIME_URL
scripts.prebuild:lambda: find themes -type d -name functions -path '*/.netlify/*' -mindepth 3 -maxdepth 3 -exec cp -rnv {} .netlify/ \; find .netlify/src -type d -name functions -mindepth 1 -maxdepth 1 -exec cp -rfv {} .netlify/ \;
